attributes.action: Allow UK students to travel on exchange trips of more than 6 months.
attributes.additional_details: Students are currently not allowed to travel internationally due to new Brexit laws students from the UK cannot travel for more than six months for exchanges and students from other countries also cannot travel to the UK for more than six months, this limits the available experience for students and the ideal of higher education.
attributes.background: Allow the travel of UK students to other countries on exchanges or school trips.

rejection.details:
Students are already able to go abroad as part of their studies for more than six months, although they might require a visa to do so. It is up to individual educational institutions what foreign study opportunities to offer its students.

If you want the Government to try and secure visa-free access for students on exchanges programmes to certain countries we could accept a petition requesting this.
